nodes.text: An orbital bioresearch facility circled the jungle planet Phaseera, in the Phaseera system which constituted a part of the Lantillian sector in the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. An exceedingly rare implant was located aboard the orbital facility.

Around 3643 BBY, a malfunction aboard the bioresearch facility caused it to crash on Phaseera's surface, at which point the station was destroyed. Subsequently, an individual affiliated with one of the sides in the ongoing struggle between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire obtained reports on the facility's crash-landing. The individual then dispatched a companion to recover any specimens from the wreckage of the station, from which the companion salvaged the implant.
The orbital bioresearch facility was mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by BioWare.
